headline: Constellation Announces Private Exchange Offers and Consent Solicitations for Calpine Corporation Notes
summary: BALTIMORE, December 09, 2025--Constellation Energy Generation, LLC ("Constellation"), a Pennsylvania limited liability company, announced today that it has commenced private offers to exchange any and all of the outstanding (i) 4.625% Senior Unsecured Notes due 2029 ("Existing Unsecured 2029 Notes"), (ii) 5.000% Senior Unsecured Notes due 2031 ("Existing Unsecured 2031 Notes") and (iii) 3.750% Senior Secured Notes ("Existing Secured 2031 Notes" and, together with the Existing Unsecured 2029 Note

headline: W. L. Gore & Associates Advances Its Emissions Reduction Efforts with Constellation’s Hourly Carbon-Free Energy Matching Offering
summary: BALTIMORE, December 09, 2025--Constellation today announced an agreement with W. L. Gore & Associates to incorporate hourly carbon-free energy matching into a prior agreement.

raw.headline: W. L. Gore & Associates Advances Its Emissions Reduction Efforts with Constellation’s Hourly Carbon-Free Energy Matching Offering
raw.summary: BALTIMORE, December 09, 2025--Constellation today announced an agreement with W. L. Gore & Associates to incorporate hourly carbon-free energy matching into a prior agreement.

headline: How Recent Shifts In The Story Give Constellation Energy An Edge Against Competitors
summary: Constellation Energy’s latest valuation update reflects a slightly lower fair value estimate of about $399.93 per share, even as the underlying narrative remains broadly constructive. With the discount rate essentially unchanged and revenue growth assumptions trimmed only modestly, the move signals a more measured, but still optimistic, view on how quickly the company can convert strong demand into durable results. Stay tuned to see how investors can track these incremental shifts in...
